mapper.select: SELECT * FROM periodtime WHERE vhouse_id = #{id} ORDER BY sort DESC
SELECT * FROM vhouse ORDER BY type
SELECT * FROM vhouse WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY type
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE groups = #{id} ORDER BY sort DESC
SELECT * FROM zc_order WHERE reserveTime = #{reserveTime} AND betTime = #{betTime}
SELECT * FROM zc_order WHERE reserveTime = #{reserveTime} AND betTime = #{betTime} AND vid=#{vid} ORDER BY oid DESC
SELECT * FROM periodtime_close WHERE venues_id = #{venues_id}
SELECT * FROM periodtime WHERE vhouse_id = #{vhouse_id} AND betTime = #{betTime} ORDER BY sort DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO periodtime_close (pid,close_date,close_time,type,venues_id) VALUES (#{pid},#{close_date},#{close_time}, #{type}, #{venues_id})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO zc_order (pid,vid,openid,orderId,name,phone,betTime,reserveTime,price,type,remakes,createTime) VALUES (#{pid},#{vid}, #{openid}, #{orderId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{betTime}, #{reserveTime}, #{price}, #{type}, #{remakes}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vhouse WHERE id in (select groups from venues where vid = #{id})
SELECT * FROM typepo ORDER BY sort DESC
SELECT * FROM vhouse WHERE id =#{id}
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE vid =#{id}
SELECT * FROM periodtime WHERE pid =#{pid}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.reserveTime = #{reserveTime} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND o.betTime = #{betTime} ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.reserveTime = #{reserveTime} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.betTime = #{betTime} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.type = #{orderTypeReach} OR o.type = #{orderTypeReachAlipay} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.type = #{type} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') ORDER BY o.oid DESC limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.reserveTime LIKE #{reserveTime} AND o.betTime LIKE #{betTime} AND o.type = #{type} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.reserveTime LIKE #{reserveTime} AND o.type = #{type} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.betTime LIKE #{betTime} AND o.type = #{type} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.vid in (select vid from venues where groups = #{changdi}) AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.reserveTime = #{reserveTime} AND o.betTime = #{betTime} AND o.vid in (select vid from venues where groups = #{changdi}) AND o.type = #{type} AND o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%') AND o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO venues (groups,vName) VALUES (#{groups},#{vName})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO periodtime (betTime,price,weekPrice,vhouse_id,sort) VALUES (#{betTime},#{price},#{weekPrice},#{vhouse_id},#{sort})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.vid in (select vid from venues where groups = #{changdi}) AND o.type = #{orderTypeReach} OR o.type = #{orderTypeReachAlipay} AND o.reserveTime between #{start_date} and #{end_date} order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.vid in (select vid from venues where groups = #{changdi}) AND o.type = #{type} AND o.reserveTime between #{start_date} and #{end_date} order by o.oid desc limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO zc_order (pid,vid,type,orderId,reserveTime,betTime,openid,name,phone,createTime,price) VALUES (#{pid},#{vid},#{type},#{orderId},#{reserveTime},#{betTime},#{openid},#{name},#{phone},#{createTime},#{price})
